title: ASC-EC
definition:
Access Service Coordination - Exchange Company Identifies the ICSC code of the Access Service Coordination - Exchange Company (ASC-EC )  whenever an access service passes through more than one provider territory. 
An entry in this field indicates that a Multi-EC Form must be associated with this access service request.
usageNotes:
Required when multiple providers are involved in providing access service and the EVCI field is not equal to "B".  
Required when the JPR field is populated. 
Otherwise prohibited.
